reviews.review_msg: Dr. Kenneth Hopscotch might be the biggest hardass I've ever met. One of our class projects was to determine how to modify a mouse's DNA to make its fur secrete bleach. How am I supposed to do that in a single semester? And if you complain, he makes you carry these big, long, heavy black bags to the dumpster. How is that appropriate?

Dr. Hopscotch is an amazing geneticist, and he is a gifted teacher.  Assignments were fascinating- I engineered a chocolate flavored banana!  He blows my mind... although I'm very curious as to what happens behind the doors of his office... he is very secretive about his research.
